By adding trip insurance, I acknowledge I have read, understand
and agree to the terms and conditions of the

You have purchased Travel Guard(R) trip insurance from AIG Travel. Insurance details, along with applicable definitions and terms of coverage, are fully described in your Policy of Insurance. It  is your responsibility to read and understand the details of your coverage.
To ask about a Travel Guard product or file a claim, please call 1-877-934-8308.
By selecting the add travel insurance button, I acknowledge that I have read, understand
COVID-19 is a foreseen event and certain coverages will not apply.
Plan not available to Washington and New York residents.
